AI Description: IQ-TREE is a fast and effective software for phylogenomic inference. It implements a variety of models for DNA and protein sequences, including substitution models, rate heterogeneity, and mixture models. IQ-TREE uses maximum likelihood estimation to construct phylogenetic trees, and offers ultrafast bootstrap approximation to assess the tree accuracy.
Core Features: Phylogenomic Inference, Substitution Models, Ultrafast Bootstrap Approximation, Maximum Likelihood Estimation
General Tags: Phylogenetics, Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Phylogenomic Analysis
